column4: i have amd athlon X2 3800+ socket AM2 and motherboard asus with chipset nforce4. I have download iso for AMD64 architecture. I boot from cd and select install but after have load kernel, there's a black image with ubuntu and the system don't process with the installation (i've have waited half hour)
no, kernel panic say if i install i386 architect
ive had the same kinda problem a couple of times.. once it was fixed by disconnecting a hdd
